---
title: "HealthData Example"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(RSocrata)
library(tidyverse)
library(tmap); tmap_mode("view")

d <- read.socrata("https://healthdata.gov/resource/g62h-syeh.json")
d<-as.data.frame(d[1:100,])
d$geocoded_state.coordinates<-stringr::str_sub(d$geocoded_state.coordinates, 3, -2)
d<-d %>%
  separate('geocoded_state.coordinates', sep = ",", into = c("lat","lon")) 
d <-d %>%
  select(lat,lon) %>%
  sf::st_as_sf(coords = c("lat","lon"), crs = 4326) 

m <- tm_basemap("CartoDB.Positron") +
  tm_shape(d)+
  tm_dots()
m

```
